definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: The helix seal was put forward to be used in ultra-micro gas turbine(UMGT) system for reducing gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 提出将螺旋密封应用于超微燃气透平气体介质密封。

sentences.english: A wind turbine has a life span of at least 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 风力透平的寿命至少是25年。

sentences.english: The center line of condenser shall be opposite to the exhaust end of syn gas compressor turbine.
sentences.chinese: 凝汽器中心线正对合成气压缩机透平排汽端。

sentences.english: The gas-steam mixture enters into turbine and delivers mechanical work.
sentences.chinese: 燃气和蒸汽混合进入透平工作，输出机械功。

sentences.english: The economic feasibility of application of hydraulic turbine in a 1.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了炼油厂中液力透平的应用方案，以1。

sentences.english: The increase of the gas turbine work ratio is mostly demonstrated by the increase of the turbine initial temperature.
sentences.chinese: 燃气轮机效率的提高，主要表现在透平初温的提高。

sentences.english: The turbine had been running for 4 hours beforecarrying a full load.
sentences.chinese: 透平在满载前已运转了4个小时。

sentences.english: The recent research and development of the sealing technology in modern turbomachinery is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对现代透平机械的密封技术研究进行了综述。

sentences.chinese: 将主机透平过滤网处用帆布盖上。

sentences.english: A reliability design method of turbine rotors is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍透平转子的可靠性设计方法。

sentences.english: The TG70 steam turbine has a operation speed of 9600rotations per minute( RPM).
sentences.chinese: TG70型蒸汽透平的运转速率为每分钟9600转。

sentences.english: This new type of nozzle can be applied in the large power turbines as the first stage.
sentences.chinese: 该新型喷咀可用于大功率透平的第一级。

sentences.english: What is the difference expansion between turbine expander and valve throttle ?
sentences.chinese: 透平式膨胀机和节流阀之间的膨胀有什么不同。

sentences.english: The steam purity has an effect on operation of turbine.
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽纯度对透平机的运行有较大影响。
